segments.description: A vibrant product shot of the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can prominently displayed.
segments.visualPrompt: A studio product shot showing an Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can standing upright with the product on a light blue scalloped pedestal surface in front of a hot pink background, with a second partial can on a matching pedestal at the left edge. The camera slowly zooms in on the can, highlighting the bold colors and design details. Soft studio lighting enhances the vibrancy of the product, while minimal shadows maintain focus on the can's features.

segments.description: The energy drink can is featured in an extreme sports setting.
segments.visualPrompt: As the camera transitions from the product shot, it cuts to a young adult skateboarder performing tricks at a skate park. The skateboarder takes a break and reaches for the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can from a nearby table. The focus shifts to the can as it is lifted, with the bright colors of the can contrasting against the vibrant skate park backdrop.
visualPromptAlternatives: The scene shifts to a young adult mountain biker riding down a trail. Upon stopping, they grab the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can from their backpack, showcasing the product as they refresh themselves after an exhilarating ride.

The video transitions to a young adult rock climber at a climbing gym. After reaching the top, the climber pulls out the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can, holding it up triumphantly as the camera captures the energy of the moment.

The footage changes to a group of friends surfing at the beach. One of them pulls out the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can from a cooler, and the camera zooms in on the can as itâ€™s passed around, emphasizing its refreshing qualities.

segments.description: The final shot showcases the energy drink with a call to action.
segments.visualPrompt: The screen transitions back to the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can on the light blue scalloped pedestal. The camera performs a slow zoom-out, revealing the can in its vibrant setting as energetic music builds. The background fades slightly to emphasize the product, and text appears on screen: 'Try it now and feel the rush!'
visualPromptAlternatives: The final shot returns to the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can, illuminated by bright studio lights. The camera pulls back slowly, and dynamic text overlays the scene: 'Unleash your potential - Try it now!'

The scene shifts back to the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can, with fast-paced music playing. The camera rotates around the can, showcasing its vibrant design, while a voiceover encourages viewers: 'Fuel your adventure with Alani!'

The closing shot features the Alani Cherry Twist energy drink can, with the camera slowly tilting down to reveal the product in all its glory. The screen flashes 'Boost your performance - Try it now!' in bold, exciting text.
